Package org.lwjgl.cuda

Class CU.Functions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.cuda.CU.Functions
  • Enclosing class:
    CU
    public static final class CU.Functions
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the function pointers loaded from the NVCUDA SharedLibrary.
